```{r include = FALSE}

# load necessary functions
setwd("/mydir/not_for_upload_in_git/blog_post_bootstrapping/")

source("bootstrap_two_way_rm_anova.R")

# number of subjects
n = 20

set.seed(10)
a <- rnorm(29, 2, 2)
set.seed(20)
b <- rnorm(3, 6, 1)
set.seed(30)
c <- rnorm(8, 8, 1)
weight_loss <- cbind(c(a, b, c))
sport_intervention = matrix(c(rep(0, n), rep(1, n)))
diet = matrix(c(rep(0,n/2), rep(1,n/2), rep(0,n/2), rep(1,n/2)))
id = matrix(c(1:n,1:n))

rm_anova_weight_loss_bootstrap = bootstrap_2way_rm_anova_using_boot(weight_loss, diet, sport_intervention, id, 3000)

```
